name: Blob Run: Color Edition
description:
** The adorable Black Blob from the hit game, Blob Run: Black and White Edition is back! And this time it's doing it in color! **

Play as the cute Black Blob in this addictive running game!
Now in full color!
Easy to learn, hard to master!
Tap to jump! Don't fall between the platforms!

**FEATURES**
- Black Blob meets color - the classic hit remastered in color!
- Super simple but super fun!
- Easy to learn, hard to master!
- Once you pick it up, you won't put it down!
- Highly additive!
- Best of all, it's FREE to play!

Download it now and have some guaranteed fun!
Not satisfied? Contact the developer at apprepublicllc[@]gmail.com!

Visit our website for more fun games and mobile apps!
http://theapprepublic.com
Follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook to keep up with our latest apps and games!
